articles.title: 'Over-the-top Kohli faces questions over his form and his captaincy'
articles.description: Virat Kohli's aggressive leadership inspires India at times, but it looks childish when it doesn't come off, says cricket journalist Suresh Menon.
articles.content:
Virat Kohli made 115, 141 and 147 in his first three innings as Test captain in 2014

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Hiding in Kabul - the cricket players who fear for their lives
articles.description: Members of Afghanistan's women's cricket team are hiding in Kabul, fearing for their safety following the Taliban's return to power.
articles.content:
A Taliban fighter walks past a beauty salon with defaced images of women in Kabul
Asel and many of her international team-mates are in hiding. Asel isn't her real name. In Kabul members of the Talib… [+7910 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
